bibl.title: Sacred Scriptures as Trash: Biblical Papyri from Oxyrhynchus. Avec résumé en anglais.
bibl.note: Parts of this paper were presented at the New Testament Textual Criticism session of the Society of Biblical Literature in 2006, at the Social History of Formative Christianity and Judaism section of the Society of Biblical Literature in 2008, and the Group for the Study of Late Antiquity at Princeton University in February, 2009. - [Introduction.] - Oxyrhynchus under a Magnifying Glass. - Dissecting the Dump. - A Garbological Approach. - From Sacred Scriptures to Religious Rubbish. - Not Persecution, Lack of Canonicity, or Fragments Only. - The Death of Codices. - Pp. 250-254: Appendix: Entire Manuscripts Discarded.
